onUnavailable().Description: Called if no network is found in the timeout time specified in @B_android#net#ConnectivityManager#requestNetwork_E@ call or if the requested network request cannot be fulfilled (whether or not a timeout was specified). When this callback is invoked the associated @B_android#net#NetworkRequest_E@ will have already been removed and released, as if @B_android#net#ConnectivityManager#unregisterNetworkCallback_E@ had been called.

Parameters: @B_android#net#Network_E@
Network: The @B_android#net#Network_E@ whose capabilities have changed. This value must never be null.
@B_android#net#NetworkCapabilities_E@
NetworkCapabilities: The new @B_android#net#NetworkCapabilities_E@ for this network. This value must never be null.
onCapabilitiesChanged(android.net.Networ.Description: Called when the network the framework connected to for this request changes capabilities but still satisfies the stated need.
onCapabilitiesChanged(android.net.Networ.FullName: public void onCapabilitiesChanged (Network network, NetworkCapabilities networkCapabilities)

Parameters: @B_android#net#Network_E@
Network: The @B_android#net#Network_E@ whose link properties have changed. This value must never be null.
@B_android#net#LinkProperties_E@
LinkProperties: The new @B_android#net#LinkProperties_E@ for this network. This value must never be null.
onLinkPropertiesChanged(android.net.Netw.Description: Called when the network the framework connected to for this request changes @B_android#net#LinkProperties_E@.
onLinkPropertiesChanged(android.net.Netw.FullName: public void onLinkPropertiesChanged (Network network, LinkProperties linkProperties)

Parameters: @B_android#net#Network_E@
Network: The @B_android#net#Network_E@ of the satisfying network. This value must never be null.
onAvailable(android.net.Network).Description: Called when the framework connects and has declared a new network ready for use. This callback may be called more than once if the @B_android#net#Network_E@ that is satisfying the request changes. This will always immediately be followed by a call to @B_android#net#ConnectivityManager#NetworkCallback#onCapabilitiesChanged_E@ then by a call to @B_android#net#ConnectivityManager#NetworkCallback#onLinkPropertiesChanged_E@, and a call to @B_android#net#ConnectivityManager#NetworkCallback#onBlockedStatusChanged_E@.

Parameters: @B_android#net#Network_E@
Network: The @B_android#net#Network_E@ lost. This value must never be null.
onLost(android.net.Network).Description: Called when the framework has a hard loss of the network or when the graceful failure ends.

Parameters: @B_android#net#Network_E@
Network: The @B_android#net#Network_E@ that is about to be disconnected.
int
int: The time in ms the framework will attempt to keep the network connected. Note that the network may suffer a hard loss at any time.
onLosing(android.net.Network, int).Description: Called when the network is about to be disconnected. Often paired with an @B_android#net#ConnectivityManager#NetworkCallback#onAvailable_E@ call with the new replacement network for graceful handover. This may not be called if we have a hard loss (loss without warning). This may be followed by either a @B_android#net#ConnectivityManager#NetworkCallback#onLost_E@ call or a @B_android#net#ConnectivityManager#NetworkCallback#onAvailable_E@ call for this network depending on whether we lose or regain it.
onLosing(android.net.Network, int).FullName: public void onLosing (Network network, int maxMsToLive)

Parameters: @B_android#net#Network_E@
Network: The @B_android#net#Network_E@ whose blocked status has changed. This value must never be null.
boolean
boolean: The blocked status of this @B_android#net#Network_E@.
onBlockedStatusChanged(android.net.Netwo.Description: Called when access to the specified network is blocked or unblocked.
onBlockedStatusChanged(android.net.Netwo.FullName: public void onBlockedStatusChanged (Network network, boolean blocked)

Parameters: @B_android#net#Network_E@
Network: The @B_android#net#Network_E@ that is about to be disconnected. This value must never be null.
int
int: The time in ms the framework will attempt to keep the network connected. Note that the network may suffer a hard loss at any time.
onLosing(android.net.Network,int).Description: Called when the network is about to be disconnected. Often paired with an @B_android#net#ConnectivityManager#NetworkCallback#onAvailable_E@ call with the new replacement network for graceful handover. This may not be called if we have a hard loss (loss without warning). This may be followed by either a @B_android#net#ConnectivityManager#NetworkCallback#onLost_E@ call or a @B_android#net#ConnectivityManager#NetworkCallback#onAvailable_E@ call for this network depending on whether we lose or regain it.
onLosing(android.net.Network,int).FullName: public void onLosing (Network network, int maxMsToLive)

ClassDesc: Base class for NetworkRequest callbacks. Used for notifications about network changes. Should be extended by applications wanting notifications. A NetworkCallback is registered by calling @B_android#net#ConnectivityManager#requestNetwork_E@, @B_android#net#ConnectivityManager#registerNetworkCallback_E@, or @B_android#net#ConnectivityManager#registerDefaultNetworkCallback_E@. A NetworkCallback is unregistered by calling @B_android#net#ConnectivityManager#unregisterNetworkCallback_E@. A NetworkCallback should be registered at most once at any time. A NetworkCallback that has been unregistered can be registered again.
